techs.name: Generational Ships
techs.quote: 'It's not much, but it's home.' - J.K. Rowling

techs.name: Nanotechnology
techs.quote: When you don't have much to work with, a tiny improvement is a lot more impressive!

techs.name: Zero-G Fabrication
techs.quote: Our slogan: 'Where everything floats, including the budget.'

techs.name: Expert Systems
techs.quote: I have all of your knowledge, but none of your expensive student loans.

techs.name: Pre-Tracting Ionization
techs.quote: Basically, we zap things so they go where we want. It's science, not a superpower.

techs.name: Micro Particulate Shielding
techs.quote: Because getting hit by a speck of dust at a million miles per hour is surprisingly painful.

techs.name: Orbital Swarming
techs.quote: What's the hardest part about coordinating a Dyson swarm?  Getting all the little robots to agree on a playlist.

techs.name: Cryogenics
techs.quote: Just a nap. A very, very long nap. Please don't wake us for a snack.

techs.name: Artificial Super Intelligence
techs.quote: We designed a brain smarter than us. What could possibly go wrong? Right?

techs.name: Photon Computing
techs.quote: It's a quantum leap forward... or just a really bright light bulb.

techs.name: Laser Propulsion
techs.quote: Look, if a cat can chase a laser pointer, why can't a spaceship?

techs.name: Athermal Lense
techs.quote: So you're saying it's... 'cool'?

techs.name: High Efficiency Fusion
techs.quote: I asked my hydrogen atoms for a commitment, but they said it's not that simple; you have to go through a very intense and complicated process to form a lasting bond.

techs.name: Strange Battery
techs.quote: We call it 'strange' because it defies all known science. Also, it hums show tunes.

techs.name: Quantum Computing
techs.quote: It's either on, off, both, or maybe it's just really confused.

techs.name: C-Fractional Thrust
techs.quote: At 0.0001c, our trip is so uneventful that the onboard computer is just running a screen saver of a star field.

techs.name: Directed Plasma
techs.quote: It's like a garden hose, but for melting things.

techs.name: Macro Swarming
techs.quote: It's not hoarding if you're building a civilization. Right?

techs.name: Exotic Matter Condenser
techs.quote: This anti joke annihilates a sense of humor

techs.name: Graviton Manipulation
techs.quote: Don't think of it as breaking the laws of physics. Think of it as 'bending' them... a lot.
